title: I was told Seabreeze ave which runs off masonboro sound rd. was at one time a public park. I live on shorewood hills dr. and would love to know if there was access to the sound fron seabreeze..Thanks
text:
At one time,  yes, there was access. Read more about Seabreeze here:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20090627/ARTICLES/906279973
